body_html:
You can probably construct a tf.SparseTensor from three placeholders (for the values, indices, and shape) and then feed dense numpy arrays for each of those.
http://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/sparse_ops.html#sparse-tensors

body:
You can probably construct a tf.SparseTensor from three placeholders (for the values, indices, and shape) and then feed dense numpy arrays for each of those.
http://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/sparse_ops.html#sparse-tensors
